headline: KLA Corporation: Wells Fargo struggles to see upside drivers for 2026 estimates
summary: Investing.com -- Wells Fargo downgraded KLA Corporation to Equal Weight from Overweight on Tuesday, highlighting valuation concerns and a lack of clear upside drivers to already optimistic 2026 forecasts.
